Body:
I am doing a project for my corporate, It is purely for IoT domain in which it involves circuits, sensors, Remote terminal unit and communication protocols. I want to have more details about my projects!

Can anyone pls help out this to find a perfect forum to discuss this, or can I ask my doubts here in stack overflow???

Any help is highly appreciable!!

I suggest you look at (Instructables)[http://www.instructables.com]. There are plenty of IoT projects with GitHub repositories. Also, take a look at various projects at hackathons. Also, various IoT cloud providers have projects you can explore yourself. I find the IBM bluemix team a good source. Also, look at Youtube.
StackOverflow is for asking for help specifically with programming or code problems.
